body:
## Bug Report

**What version of Rust are you using?**
<!-- You can run `rustc --version` -->

**What operating system and CPU are you using?**
<!-- You can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

**What did you do?**

Run TiKV

**What did you expect to see?**

```
2018/06/22 22:16:24.725 pd.rs:437: [INFO] [region 4128085] try to change peer RemoveNode id: 4604857 store_id: 53
2018/06/22 22:17:23.736 pd.rs:437: [INFO] [region 4128085] try to change peer RemoveNode id: 4604857 store_id: 53
2018/06/22 22:18:22.467 pd.rs:437: [INFO] [region 4128085] try to change peer RemoveNode id: 4604857 store_id: 53
2018/06/22 22:19:20.896 pd.rs:437: [INFO] [region 4128085] try to change peer RemoveNode id: 4604857 store_id: 53
2018/06/22 22:20:19.209 pd.rs:437: [INFO] [region 4128085] try to change peer RemoveNode id: 4604857 store_id: 53
```

**What did you see instead?**

```
Jun 29 20:00:43.749 INFO [region 2] on split region at key t\200\000\000\000\000\000\000\377\027\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\370.
Jun 29 20:00:43.749 INFO [region 2] 3 epoch changed conf_ver: 1 version: 10 != conf_ver: 1 version: 9, retry later
Jun 29 20:00:43.850 INFO [region 2] on split region at key t\200\000\000\000\000\000\000\377\027\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\370.
Jun 29 20:00:43.850 DEBG scheduling task ask split region 2 with key t\200\000\000\000\000\000\000\377\027\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\370
Jun 29 20:00:43.850 DEBG loop poll - 145.552154ms
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG loop time - Instant { t: 415878455685656 }
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG loop process - 1 events, 18.385µs
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG executing task ask split region 2 with key t\200\000\000\000\000\000\000\377\027\000\000\000\000\000\000\000\370
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG reconnect remains: 10
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG loop poll - 7.582µs
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG loop time - Instant { t: 415878455772221 }
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG request sent: 1
Jun 29 20:00:43.851 DEBG loop process - 1 events, 151.553µs
Jun 29 20:00:43.852 DEBG loop poll - 9.057µs
Jun 29 20:00:43.852 DEBG loop time - Instant { t: 415878455943688 }
Jun 29 20:00:43.852 DEBG loop process - 0 events, 11.349µs
Jun 29 20:00:43.852 DEBG loop poll - 221.894µs
```

Note: source like `pd.rs:437` is missing. This will lead to notable inconvenience when tracing issues.
title: log not outputting source
